Author: wallchain
Title: ðŸš€[ANN] WALLCHAIN | The Future Of Blockchain | Infinite TPS & Zero FEEðŸš€
Body: https://i.imgur.com/1dt15nO.jpg  WALLCHAIN - THE FUTURE OF BLOCKCHAIN  The biggest advantages to WallChain platform is zero fees, instant transactions, and unlimited scalability.  - Infinite TPS - Zero FEE - Unlimited Scalability - Downsizing Data   WALL BLOCKCHAIN NETWORK  The goal of our research on the Wall platform is to create a platform that is intuitive to use and that can be implemented in various ways. Examples of types of use for the WallChain platform include: implementation of a Wall-based secure cryptocurrency that is fast and inexpensive  that can be used as a means of exchanging value;the creation of decentralized business ledgers to improve information security and facil-itate the storage and transmission of more efficient data; and adding cryptographic security to stock exchanges. Potential types of use and innovations built with the WallChain platform are vast and can be adapted to give potential users the flexibility to create the blockchain solution they need.   ROADMAP  - Q4 2017 (Research & Development) - Feb 2018 (WallChain Concept and Whitepaper draft) - Mar 2018 (Token Private Sale - Raised 1M) - Apr 2018 (Official Whitepaper Release, and Partnership) - Jun 2018 (Presale) - Jul 2018 (Public Token Sale and Release Testnet) - Aug 2018 (Token Distribution and Listed on Exchange) - Set 2018 (WallChain Conference in Tokyo and Seoul) - Q4 2018 (Release Mainnet and First Smart Contract) - Q1 2019 (Build Application Support Tools) - Q2 2019 (+100 Projects Join to WallChain Ecosystem)   TOKEN METRIC  Total supply: 15,000,000 WALL  Token Sale: 60% Team & Advisor: 20% (Token locked for 2 years) Marketing: 13% Foundation: 7%   TOKEN SALE  - Raised: $1,000,000 - Softcap: $3,000,000 - Hardcap: $9,000,000  Pre Sale: Hardcap: 8,000,000 $ KYC/AML Required 1 WALL = 0.90$ Min Contributions: 50 ETH Max Contributions: 1,000 ETH Contact: info@wallchain.io  Main Sale: Hardcap: 8,000,000 $ KYC/AML Required 1 WALL = 1$ Min Contributions: 0.1 ETH Max Contributions: 100 ETH  Token release: 2 weeks after token sale completes.  Can't partecipate: Usa, China  ** Unsold tokens will be burned. *** Private Sale tokens have a 25% bonus and are locked for 6 months.  LINK  Site: https://wallchain.io Whitepaper: https://wallchain.io/whitepaper.pdf Twitter: https://twitter.com/wallchain_io Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WallChainOfficial Telegram Channel: https://t.me/WallchainOfficial
